JobFullDesc: Since 1992, Ciena has been driven by a relentless pursuit of network innovation.  We believe in a network that grows smarter, more agile, and more responsive every day. This means that when you digitally interact in your world - picking up the phone, streaming video, texting a friend or loved one – your interactions are being enabled by Ciena technologies.  Ciena makes your social / entertainment / business existence REAL.Your Role as our Senior Product Line Architect – Security The Routing and Switching Portfolio group has an opening for a Principal Engineer within the Product Line Architecture team. In this role you will be a key leader in this small, energetic team, driving the product requirements for routing and switching products, especially in the area of security.To be successful you will have worked with product management, sales account teams, and customers to both understand their use cases and market requirements in order to guide the customer to solutions which most effectively utilize Ciena’s capabilities.If you have a passion to author requirements which articulate to engineering general market needs as well as specific customer use cases this will be the right role for you.As part of your past experience you have facilitated pragmatic coordination between engineering teams and product management on roadmaps, requirements details, and specific deployment challenges.Your Responsibilities:Provide leadership as key product line architect for security and other key aspects of our routing and switching products;Participate in product definition and architecture, and support engineering teams in design, scoping, planning, implementation, and test;Work closely with key customers to develop solutions that address their immediate and future needs;Be a subject matter expert, keeping abreast of industry trends and innovations, and use that expertise to guide product managers and senior management team;Deliver detailed functional requirements and influence technical designs for packet switching software architectures and network management;Work with Product Line Management team to assess strategic market directions and customer requirements;Present Ciena solutions to a variety of internal and external audiences, including senior management and technical/operational leads. Required Skills to be successful:Full understanding of computer security fundamentals, including AAA, X.509/PKI, SSH, TLS, etc.;Deep knowledge of network and network equipment security mechanisms, including TACACS+/RADIUS, TPM, IPsec, MACsec, 802.1x, firewalls, ACLs, IPS, etc.;Experience with Common Criteria and FIPS and general requirements for security testing and certification;Knowledge of network configuration and management, including YANG data modeling and NETCONF, RESTCONF, gNMI, and OpenConfig;Knowledge of network performance monitoring, telemetry, and troubleshooting;Practical experience with carrier-class data network deployments, including solution details regarding system security, network management, and service assurance;Ability to interact effectively with customers, vendors, and internal cross-functional teams and to work across geographies and time zones;Leadership to independently take initiative while still working collaboratively within the product architecture team, demonstrating good judgment in generating and evaluating alternative approaches to address business and technical challenges;Excellent verbal and written communications skills.Your Experience:10+ Years of relevant experience in senior roles in software/systems engineering and/or technical product management;Master’s or Bachelor’s degree in telecommunications, computer science or a related discipline;Product design and delivery experience with network equipment and management systems designed for Service Provider deployments;Experience in documenting customer use cases and technical requirements.About Ciena Ciena is a network strategy and technology company with a passion to provide an experience, to you and our customers that is as rewarding as the outcome.   We attract the best and brightest– those with outstanding talent, motivation, and the right attitude to contribute to our success. Our culture balances our openness and informality with professionalism and trust and is built on the foundation of our core values: Customer First, Integrity, Velocity, Innovation, and Outstanding People.   Ciena enables everyone to have a voice and a network that supports them while on the journey to discovering their passion and purpose.  We trust each individual to do what they can to reach their full potential and make an impact on the business, whenever, wherever they are in the world.  With Ciena’s highly innovative, forward-thinking business practices, we reward people for pushing the boundaries.  Unlock your potential at Ciena!  Being You @ Ciena As part of our commitment to diversity and inclusion, we want to foster an environment that values and respects all individual’s strengths, perspectives, ideas, and ability to meet the needs of our customers globally.
